definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

pinyin: zi4 dong4 huan4 dao1 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: The tool changing mechanism is the action of tool exchange.
sentences.chinese: 換刀機構則是執行刀具交換的動作。

sentences.english: Treatment measures in underground stratum reinforcement and open space with pressure to change cutter and tool.
sentences.chinese: 地下處理措施中的地層加固方案和帶壓開艙換刀方案。

sentences.english: The central storeroom can automatically change the cutters.
sentences.chinese: 中心刀庫具有自動換刀能力。

sentences.english: Single Spindle Turret with 40 Auto Tool Changer.
sentences.chinese: 單錠炮塔與40個自動換刀。
